comment: We choose the notation ` ( Z e. ( X L Y ) \/ X = Y ) ` instead of "colinear" in order to avoid defining an additional symbol for colinearity because ` LineG ` is a common structure slot for other axiomatizations of geometry. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 25-May-2019.)
